title: Sunset Fragrance Campaign
summary: A luxury scent campaign blending emotion, elegance, and vibrant femininity for Sunset Fragrance.
story: Directed art and visual narrative around modern elegance and confidence.
Created print and digital campaign visuals with cinematic lighting and bold type hierarchy.
Integrated tactile color themes — lavender, rose, and satin gold — across media for consistent identity.

title: Nike AirForce Limited Edition
summary: Art direction and digital promotion design for Nike’s AirForce limited edition sneaker drop.
story: Crafted clean and balanced product shots emphasizing motion and contrast.
Built digital campaign visuals optimized for dark-mode platforms and e-commerce.
Merged minimalist layout with gradient accents to align with Nike’s evolving youth appeal.

title: Mido Architect Watch Series
summary: Luxury timepiece campaign inspired by architectural forms and golden-hour precision.
story: Developed concept connecting Mido’s craftsmanship to iconic global architecture.
Designed cinematic lighting and composition flow blending precision and emotion.
Executed both print and digital storytelling through dramatic photography and material realism.

title: Duality Barbershop Visual Identity
summary: Visual identity and brand design for a contemporary barbershop that celebrates precision and craft.
story: Redefined masculine minimalism with fluid shapes, bold fonts, and contrast lighting.
Crafted a campaign blending lifestyle imagery with high-contrast color grading.
Elevated the perception of a barbershop to an urban grooming experience brand.

title: Campus Trip Event Branding
summary: A vibrant campaign capturing youthful adventure and community spirit for a student travel event.
story: Developed bright, energetic visual language with playful typographic rhythm.
Balanced tropical tones with structured information hierarchy for clarity.
Optimized for both print posters and social reels with adaptive layouts.

title: Global Travel Brand Campaign
summary: Refreshing brand campaign for a global travel agency promoting experiential journeys.
story: Conceptualized an uplifting tone that merges exploration with relaxation.
Used curved composition and blue gradients to reflect sky and motion.
Built cohesive assets for banners, posters, and print collaterals.

title: Ramen Delight — Brand Promo
summary: A modern food photography campaign for Ramen Delight blending color, warmth, and culture.
story: Styled a cinematic lighting setup to emphasize flavor and comfort.
Created high-definition renders combining motion and realism.
Composed menu visuals and motion graphics with Asian design cues.

title: Sunset Fragrance Campaign
summary: Luxury perfume brand campaign combining elegance, emotion, and vibrant design to capture modern femininity.
story: Created a visually rich perfume campaign blending minimal composition with warm tones and bold typography.
Art-directed photo editing and layout to emphasize product luxury and lifestyle aspiration.
Developed print and digital assets for billboard, social, and in-store marketing — maintaining consistent premium aesthetic.

title: Neon Grid System
summary: An interactive parametric grid built using shaders and motion logic to generate evolving neon patterns.
story: Developed a dynamic system that visualizes rhythm and spacing in real-time through glowing geometric grids.
Experimented with Three.js and GLSL shaders to create an evolving interplay of motion, structure, and light.
The grid reacts to user input, transforming structure into living motion.

title: Aurora Vision Prototype
summary: Immersive real-time visual system exploring brand identity through generative light and sound.
story: A multi-sensory prototype combining visual motion, sound mapping, and brand color palettes.
Developed using WebGL + Audio API for synchronized generative expression.
This experiment redefines how brand identity can live and breathe interactively.

title: Poster Engine VR
summary: A VR-driven poster generator blending physical gestures with AI typography systems.
story: Explored immersive poster generation using motion-tracked inputs and parametric typographic rules.
Users could ‘paint’ posters in space using gestures, instantly outputting design compositions.
A glimpse into future creative workflows — intuitive, spatial, and generative.

title: Synesthetic Motion System
summary: A multisensory experiment visualizing sound through dynamic generative motion and color mapping.
story: Designed an immersive system that transforms audio input into reactive shapes and light gradients.
Built with WebGL and motion sensors to map gesture and rhythm in real time.
The result is a living artwork — part design, part performance, always evolving.
